title: FS: Lot of 5 low/mid-grade T205 Commons w/ Hoblitzel SP
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 5 low/mid-grade T205 Commons w/ Hoblitzel SP
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are low to mid-grade cards as the scans will show, and all have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured:

Becker - $25 **SOLD**
Doyle - $25 **SOLD**
Gardner - $25
Hoblitzell (name incorrect, no "Cin") - $45 **SOLD**
Olmstead - $18
